verses.verse: וְנֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> ve-Ne-fesh And if a soul כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- now if תֶחֱטָ֗א <S%H2398><s%> te-che-Ta, sin וְשָֽׁמְעָה֙ <S%H8085><s%> ve-sha-me-'Ah and hear ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol the voice אָלָ֔ה <S%H423><s%> 'a-Lah, of swearing וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu he עֵ֔ד <S%H5707><s%> 'Ed, and [is] a witness א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> o whether רָאָ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> ra-'Ah he hath seen א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or יָדָ֑ע <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'; or known אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- if ל֥וֹא <S%H3808><s%> Lo does not יַגִּ֖יד <S%H5046><s%> yag-Gid [of it] if he do not utter וְנָשָׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> ve-na-Sa [it] then he shall bear עֲוֹנֽוֹ׃ <S%H5771><s%> a-vo-No. his iniquity

א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> o Or נֶ֗פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Ne-fesh, Or if a soul אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher if תִּגַּע֮ <S%H5060><s%> tig-Ga' touch בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol any דָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> da-Var thing טָמֵא֒ <S%H2931><s%> ta-Me any unclean אוֹ֩ <S%H176><s%> o whether בְנִבְלַ֨ת <S%H5038><s%> ve-niv-Lat whether [it be] a carcase חַיָּ֜ה <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yah beast טְמֵאָ֗ה <S%H2931><s%> te-me-'Ah, of an unclean א֤וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or בְּנִבְלַת֙ <S%H5038><s%> be-niv-Lat or a carcase בְּהֵמָ֣ה <S%H929><s%> be-he-Mah cattle טְמֵאָ֔ה <S%H2931><s%> te-me-'Ah, of unclean א֕וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or בְּנִבְלַ֖ת <S%H5038><s%> be-niv-Lat or the carcase שֶׁ֣רֶץ <S%H8318><s%> She-retz creeping things טָמֵ֑א <S%H2931><s%> ta-Me; of unclean וְנֶעְלַ֣ם <S%H5956><s%> ve-ne'-Lam and [if] it be hidden מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu, at וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu and he טָמֵ֖א <S%H2931><s%> ta-Me from him he also shall be unclean וְאָשֵֽׁם׃ <S%H816><s%> ve-'a-Shem. and guilty

א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> o Or כִ֤י <S%H3588><s%> chi if יִגַּע֙ <S%H5060><s%> yig-Ga' Or if he touch בְּטֻמְאַ֣ת <S%H2932><s%> be-tum-'At the uncleanness אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, of man לְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> le-Chol of whatever טֻמְאָת֔וֹ <S%H2932><s%> tum-'a-To, whatsoever uncleanness אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יִטְמָ֖א <S%H2930><s%> yit-Ma [it be] that a man shall be defiled בָּ֑הּ Bah; וְנֶעְלַ֣ם <S%H5956><s%> ve-ne'-Lam withal and it be hid מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu, at וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu he יָדַ֖ע <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da' from him when he knoweth וְאָשֵֽׁם׃ <S%H816><s%> ve-'a-Shem. [of it] then he shall be guilty

א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> o Or נֶ֡פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Ne-fesh Or if a soul כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki if תִשָּׁבַע֩ <S%H7650><s%> tish-sha-Va' swear לְבַטֵּ֨א <S%H981><s%> le-vat-Te pronouncing בִשְׂפָתַ֜יִם <S%H8193><s%> vis-fa-Ta-yim with [his] lips לְהָרַ֣ע׀ <S%H7489><s%> le-ha-Ra' to do evil א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or לְהֵיטִ֗יב <S%H3190><s%> le-hei-Tiv, or to do good לְ֠כֹל <S%H3605><s%> Le-chol all manner אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after יְבַטֵּ֧א <S%H981><s%> ye-vat-Te shall pronounce הָאָדָ֛ם <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam whatsoever [it be] that a man בִּשְׁבֻעָ֖ה <S%H7621><s%> bish-vu-'Ah with an oath וְנֶעְלַ֣ם <S%H5956><s%> ve-ne'-Lam and it be hid מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu; at וְהוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> ve-hu- he יָדַ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da' from him when he knoweth וְאָשֵׁ֖ם <S%H816><s%> ve-'a-Shem [of it] then he shall be guilty לְאַחַ֥ת <S%H259><s%> le-'a-Chat in one מֵאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> me-'El-leh. of these

וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become כִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> chi- shall be when יֶאְשַׁ֖ם <S%H816><s%> ye'-Sham And it shall be when he shall be guilty לְאַחַ֣ת <S%H259><s%> le-'a-Chat in one מֵאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> me-'El-leh; of these וְהִ֨תְוַדָּ֔ה <S%H3034><s%> ve-Hit-vad-Dah, of these [things] that he shall confess אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which חָטָ֖א <S%H2398><s%> cha-Ta that he hath sinned עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-ha. shall also

וְהֵבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> ve-he-Vi And he shall bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲשָׁמ֣וֹ <S%H817><s%> a-sha-Mo his trespass offering לַיהוָ֡ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al his behalf חַטָּאתוֹ֩ <S%H2403><s%> chat-ta-To for his sin אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which חָטָ֜א <S%H2398><s%> cha-Ta which he hath sinned נְקֵבָ֨ה <S%H5347><s%> ne-ke-Vah a female מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַצֹּ֥אן <S%H6629><s%> hatz-Tzon from the flock כִּשְׂבָּ֛ה <S%H3776><s%> kis-Bah a lamb אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> 'ov- or שְׂעִירַ֥ת <S%H8166><s%> se-'i-Rat or a kid עִזִּ֖ים <S%H5795><s%> 'iz-Zim of the goats לְחַטָּ֑את <S%H2403><s%> le-chat-Tat; for a sin offering וְכִפֶּ֥ר <S%H3722><s%> ve-chip-Per shall make an atonement עָלָ֛יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav his behalf הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen and the priest מֵחַטָּאתֽוֹ׃ <S%H2403><s%> me-chat-ta-To. for him concerning his sin

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- if לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> lo cannot תַגִּ֣יע <S%H5060><s%> tag-Gi' to bring יָדוֹ֮ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do And if he דֵּ֣י <S%H1767><s%> dei be not able שֶׂה֒ <S%H7716><s%> seh a lamb וְהֵבִ֨יא <S%H935><s%> ve-he-Vi then he shall bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲשָׁמ֜וֹ <S%H817><s%> a-sha-Mo his trespass אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which חָטָ֗א <S%H2398><s%> cha-Ta, which he hath committed שְׁתֵּ֥י <S%H8147><s%> she-Tei two תֹרִ֛ים <S%H8449><s%> to-Rim turtledoves אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> 'ov- or שְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei or two בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- young יוֹנָ֖ה <S%H3123><s%> yo-Nah pigeons לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; unto the LORD אֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad one לְחַטָּ֖את <S%H2403><s%> le-chat-Tat for a sin offering וְאֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> ve-'e-Chad and the other לְעֹלָֽה׃ <S%H5930><s%> le-'o-Lah. for a burnt offering

וְהֵבִ֤יא <S%H935><s%> ve-he-Vi And he shall bring אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen, them unto the priest וְהִקְרִ֛יב <S%H7126><s%> ve-hik-Riv who shall offer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לַחַטָּ֖את <S%H2403><s%> la-chat-Tat [that] which [is] for the sin offering רִאשׁוֹנָ֑ה <S%H7223><s%> ri-sho-Nah; first וּמָלַ֧ק <S%H4454><s%> u-ma-Lak and wring off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- רֹאשׁ֛וֹ <S%H7218><s%> ro-Sho his head מִמּ֥וּל <S%H4136><s%> mi-Mul from עָרְפּ֖וֹ <S%H6203><s%> a-re-Po his neck וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo shall not יַבְדִּֽיל׃ <S%H914><s%> yav-Dil. but shall not divide [it] asunder

וְהִזָּ֞ה <S%H5137><s%> ve-hiz-Zah And he shall sprinkle מִדַּ֤ם <S%H1818><s%> mid-Dam of the blood הַחַטָּאת֙ <S%H2403><s%> ha-chat-taT of the sin offering עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on קִ֣יר <S%H7023><s%> kir upon the side הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach, of the altar וְהַנִּשְׁאָ֣ר <S%H7604><s%> ve-han-nish-'Ar and the rest בַּדָּ֔ם <S%H1818><s%> bad-Dam, of the blood יִמָּצֵ֖ה <S%H4680><s%> yim-ma-Tzeh shall be wrung out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- at יְס֣וֹד <S%H3247><s%> ye-Sod at the bottom הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach; of the altar חַטָּ֖את <S%H2403><s%> chat-Tat it [is] a sin offering הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. he

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַשֵּׁנִ֛י <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Ni the second יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Seh And he shall offer עֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> 'o-Lah [for] a burnt offering כַּמִּשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> kam-mish-Pat; according to the manner וְכִפֶּ֨ר <S%H3722><s%> ve-chip-Per shall make an atonement עָלָ֧יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav his behalf הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen and the priest מֵחַטָּאת֥וֹ <S%H2403><s%> me-chat-ta-To for him for his sin אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which חָטָ֖א <S%H2398><s%> cha-Ta which he hath sinned וְנִסְלַ֥ח <S%H5545><s%> ve-nis-Lach and it shall be forgiven לֽוֹ׃ lo. ס sa-Mek

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- if לֹא֩ <S%H3808><s%> lo not תַשִּׂ֨יג <S%H5381><s%> tas-Sig be not able to bring יָד֜וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do But if he לִשְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> lish-Tei two תֹרִ֗ים <S%H8449><s%> to-Rim, turtledoves אוֹ֮ <S%H176><s%> o or לִשְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> lish-Nei or two בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- young יוֹנָה֒ <S%H3123><s%> yo-Nah pigeons וְהֵבִ֨יא <S%H935><s%> ve-he-Vi shall bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- קָרְבָּנ֜וֹ <S%H7133><s%> ka-re-ba-No for his offering אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which חָטָ֗א <S%H2398><s%> cha-Ta, then he that sinned עֲשִׂירִ֧ת <S%H6224><s%> 'a-si-Rit the tenth הָאֵפָ֛ה <S%H374><s%> ha-'e-Fah part of an ephah סֹ֖לֶת <S%H5560><s%> So-let of fine flour לְחַטָּ֑את <S%H2403><s%> le-chat-Tat; for a sin offering לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not יָשִׂ֨ים <S%H7760><s%> ya-Sim he shall put עָלֶ֜יהָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-ha and שֶׁ֗מֶן <S%H8081><s%> She-men, no oil וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- or יִתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten upon it neither shall he put עָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-ha and לְבֹנָ֔ה <S%H3828><s%> le-vo-Nah, [any] frankincense כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for חַטָּ֖את <S%H2403><s%> chat-Tat thereon for it [is] a sin offering הִֽיא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hi. He

וֶהֱבִיאָהּ֮ <S%H935><s%> ve-he-vi-'Ah Then shall he bring אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַכֹּהֵן֒ <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen it to the priest וְקָמַ֣ץ <S%H7061><s%> ve-ka-Matz shall take הַכֹּהֵ֣ן׀ <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen and the priest מִ֠מֶּנָּה <S%H4480><s%> Mi-men-nah at מְל֨וֹא <S%H4393><s%> me-Lo all along קֻמְצ֜וֹ <S%H7062><s%> kum-Tzo handful אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אַזְכָּרָתָה֙ <S%H234><s%> 'az-ka-ra-Tah of it [even] a memorial וְהִקְטִ֣יר <S%H6999><s%> ve-hik-Tir thereof and burn הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חָה <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-chah, [it] on the altar עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al with אִשֵּׁ֣י <S%H801><s%> 'ish-Shei according to the offerings made by fire יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; unto the LORD חַטָּ֖את <S%H2403><s%> chat-Tat it [is] a sin offering הִֽוא׃ <S%H1931><s%> hi he

וְכִפֶּר֩ <S%H3722><s%> ve-chip-Per shall make an atonement עָלָ֨יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav concerning הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen And the priest עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- concerning חַטָּאת֧וֹ <S%H2403><s%> chat-ta-To for him as touching his sin אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which חָטָ֛א <S%H2398><s%> cha-Ta that he hath sinned מֵֽאַחַ֥ת <S%H259><s%> me-'a-Chat in one מֵאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> me-'El-leh of these וְנִסְלַ֣ח <S%H5545><s%> ve-nis-Lach of these and it shall be forgiven ל֑וֹ lo; וְהָיְתָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-ye-Tah shall become לַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> lak-ko-Hen him and [the remnant] shall be the priest's כַּמִּנְחָֽה׃ <S%H4503><s%> kam-min-Chah. as a meat offering ס sa-Mek
